value:
Have you seen Keaton in his kimono?
He cuts an amazing silhouette!
I'm actually kinda jealous.

The kitsune hamlet I lived in was part
of Hoshido, so I'm pretty used to
these New Year's traditions.

They say New Year's Day sets the
tone for the whole year, so you can
bet I'm gonna make sure I look good!

Selkie and I are gonna start off the
New Year by visiting shrines. Wanna
come with, $Nu?

I feel like it'd solve a lot of problems
if folks could just set fighting aside
and enjoy the osechi on New Year's.

Happy New Year! Want some mochi?
Freshly made! I brought it over from
$Nf's castle.

I feel sleek and shiny as a freshly
brushed coat of fur. A good omen
for the new year!

Great! Now let's hurry this up.
We've got a party to get back to.

Can't let a little thing like this bring
down the New Year's mood.

How generous of you! I'll make it my
resolution to pay you back this year!

No one can throw a New Year's party
like the stylish and beautiful kitsune.
Lucky for you, you've got Kaden!

Thanks for getting me this amazing
kimono, $Nu.
I love it!$k$pI look great in everything, but New
Year's traditional wear positively
shimmers on me, don't you think?$k$pHonestly...I appreciate all that, but
most of all I'm grateful for the chance
to share this celebration with Selkie.$k$pFor that priceless gift, I'm going to
have to pay you back twice—no,
ten times over!$k$pWait, what's ten times priceless?
Is that even possible? Whatever,
I'll figure something out.$k$pYou deserve nothing but the best.
Let's all keep working together in the
new year, $Nu!
やあっ
You won't get away!
わあっ
What the-?!
Oh, that's IT!
Here's a fun idea!
Ready to play?
Happy New Year!
I wasn't...done playing...
ふふっ
This outfit does a great job of showing off my natural beauty.
No! It can't be! My tail is...ruffled.
New Year's is great! I like a holiday where you mostly eat and lie around.
I gave Selkie a little money for New Year's. Hope she spends it on something good!
Ready for a game? We got badminton...kites...and tops. I'm gonna win at any of 'em, though.
Nice of you to let me wear this beautiful kimono! I'll get you back later.
I know what the best part of your year will be: having me at your side!
I owe ya.
I look good.
Cheers!
